task.name: hsd_correctatm
task.shortdescription: Apply offline ATM correction to the data.

param.name: atmtype
param.description:
Type of atmospheric transmission model represented as an integer. Available options are,
1: tropical (default) 2: mid latitude summer 3: mid latitude winter 4: subarctic summer 5: subarctic winter

param.name: pipelinemode
param.description: The pipeline operating mode. In 'automatic' mode the pipeline determines the values of all context defined pipeline inputs automatically. In interactive mode the user can set the pipeline context defined parameters manually. In 'getinputs' mode the user can check the settings of all pipeline parameters without running the task.

param.name: infiles
param.shortdescription: List of input files to be flagged (\'\'=all)
param.description: ASDM or MS files to be processed. This parameter behaves as data selection parameter. The name specified by infiles must be registered to context before you run hsd_corectatm.

param.name: antenna
param.shortdescription: select data by antenna names or ids, e.g. \'PM03,PM04\' (\'\'=all)
param.description: Data selection by antenna names or ids. example: 'PM03,PM04' '' (all antennas)

param.name: field
param.shortdescription: select data by field names or ids, e.g. \'M100,Sgr*\' (\'\'=all)
param.description: Data selection by field names or ids. example: '*Sgr*,M100' '' (all fields)

param.name: spw
param.shortdescription: select data by spectral windows, e.g. \'3,5,7\' (\'\'=all)
param.description: Data selection by spw ids. example: '3,4' (spw 3 and 4) '' (all spws)

param.name: pol
param.description: Data selection by polarizations. example: 'XX,YY' (correlation XX and YY) '' (all polarizations)

param.name: dryrun
param.shortdescription: Run the task (False) or display the task command (True)
param.description: Run the commands (True) or generate the commands to be run but do not execute (False).

param.name: acceptresults
param.shortdescription: Add the results into the pipeline context
param.description: Add the results of the task to the pipeline context (True) or reject them (False).

param.name: parallel
param.shortdescription: Execute using CASA HPC functionality, if available.
param.description: Execute using CASA HPC functionality, if available.
